page.title: 19PUBLIC TRANSPORT QUARRINGTON
page.content:
Our D block is served by a{train service from{Sleaford}to{Grantham. Trains travel to Grantham via{Rauceby and{Ancaster.}There are nine trains each day. On Sundays there are three trains in each direction.
There is a{bus service}between Sleaford and{Grantham}run by Lincolnshire Road{Car Company.}A bus service from{Sleaford}to{Folkingham}is run by Kime's{private coach}firm. There are 6 buses a day from Sleaford to Grantham. There are l0 coaches each week from Sleaford to Folkingham.
Because of poor{public transport facilities there are a number of{taxi companies who operate in the area.
